A C E O P S W 

A

AnsiConsole - Class in picocli.jansi.graalvm
Enables the use of ANSI escape codes in GraalVM native image applications, especially, but not limited to, running on Windows.

C

close() - Method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Calls AnsiConsole.systemUninstall() if running on a Windows OS, otherwise does nothing.

E

enableLibraryLoad() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.Workaround
 
err() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
If the standard out natively supports ANSI escape codes, then this just returns System.err, otherwise it will provide an ANSI aware PrintStream which strips out the ANSI escape sequences or which implement the escape sequences.

O

out() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
If the standard out natively supports ANSI escape codes, then this just returns System.out, otherwise it will provide an ANSI aware PrintStream which strips out the ANSI escape sequences or which implement the escape sequences.

P

picocli.jansi.graalvm - package picocli.jansi.graalvm
 

S

systemInstall() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Install AnsiConsole.out to System.out and AnsiConsole.err to System.err.
systemUninstall() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
undo a previous AnsiConsole.systemInstall().

W

windowsInstall() - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Calls AnsiConsole.systemInstall() if running on a Windows OS, otherwise does nothing.
Workaround - Class in picocli.jansi.graalvm
Enables the use of Jansi native library code in GraalVM native image applications.
wrapErrorOutputStream(OutputStream) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Deprecated.
wrapOutputStream(OutputStream) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Deprecated.
wrapOutputStream(OutputStream, int) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Deprecated.
wrapPrintStream(PrintStream, int) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
Wrap PrintStream applying rules in following order: if jansi.passthrough is true, don't wrap but just passthrough (console is expected to natively support ANSI escape codes), if jansi.strip is true, just strip ANSI escape codes inconditionally, if OS is Windows and terminal is not Cygwin or Mingw, wrap as WindowsAnsiPrintStream to process ANSI escape codes, if file descriptor is a terminal (see isatty(int)) or jansi.force is true, just passthrough, else strip ANSI escape codes (not a terminal).
wrapSystemErr(PrintStream) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
 
wrapSystemOut(PrintStream) - Static method in class picocli.jansi.graalvm.AnsiConsole
